text: @ScramPratchett Then, too, his brother's former mistress, and began to think this was a dream.

passages.full_quote: <used>Then, too, his brother's</used> talk of communism, which he had treated so lightly at the time, now made him reflect

passages.fragment: , his brother 's former mistress , and began to
passages.full_quote: Flushing, he took the letter from Marya Nikolaevna, <used>his brother's former mistress, and began to</used> read it

passages.fragment: , and began to think this was a dream
passages.full_quote: I acknowledged his attention incoherently<used>, and began to think this was a dream</used>
